bridge.title: Bridge (Bring Back Octagon!)
bridge.description: Transfer your CRAA tokens between Monad and ApeChain. Fast, secure, and with minimal fees. Cross-chain for true collectors!

guide.title: ü™Ñ Breeding Guide
guide.intro: You can bring a cube back from the graveyard by paying 45% based on marketplace floor: 5% CRAA (burn) + 15% OCTAA (LP) + 25% OCTAA (pool).
guide.fee: The fee is calculated automatically from the latest market price. Distribution: 5% CRAA burned; 15% OCTAA to LP (linked to new NFT); 25% OCTAA to rewards pool.
guide.requirement: To breed, select 2 NFTs (Male + Female) that have at least 1 star. Higher stars give mutation luck.
guide.rarity: Star ratings: 1 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Common, 2 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Uncommon, 3 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Rare, 4 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Epic, 5 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Legendary, 6 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Mythic.
guide.penalty: After successful breeding, each parent loses 1 star and enters a 48-hour regeneration cooldown.
guide.step1: 1. Approve CRAA and OCTAA spending for the fees.
guide.step2: 2. Confirm Breed ‚Äî parent stars are spent, new cube is revived from graveyard.
guide.note: Collection limited to ~9,700 cubes. Parents must have genetic material (stars) left to participate.

burn.title: Burn NFT (Roast the Octagon!)
burn.description: Burn the NFT and get OCTAA tokens! Picture a fiery grill with octagons screaming: "Tell my mom I love her!"

feeBox.title: üî• Burn Fee & Steps
feeBox.step1: 1. Give the contract permission to move your NFT.
feeBox.step2: 2. Allow OCTAA spending for 10% of locked coins.
feeBox.step3: 3. Confirm final transaction ‚Äî octagon burns, OCTAA goes to you.
feeBox.note: Make sure you have enough OCTAA in your wallet for the fee before starting.

guide.title: üî• Burn Guide
guide.intro: Ping your NFT to accumulate OCTAA ‚Äî burning releases those locked coins after the wait you choose.
guide.loss: Burning permanently moves the NFT to the graveyard. After the chosen timer ends (30/120/480 min), the OCTAA heads to your wallet ‚Äî grab it via the Claim section. If the NFT was created through Breed, you also receive the WMON locked in its LP share.
guide.step1: 1. Approve the game contract to transfer your NFT.
guide.step2: 2. Approve OCTAA spending for the burn fee (10% of locked OCTAA).
guide.step3: 3. Confirm Burn. After completion, the octagon enters the graveyard and OCTAA releases after the selected wait.
guide.timing: OCTAA unlocks after the selected delay (30 / 120 / 480 min). During the wait, the NFT is visible in the CLAIM section as 'Pending'.
guide.note: Example: 10,000 locked OCTAA ‚Üí fee = 1,000 OCTAA (10%). Longer wait times give YOU a larger share (up to 80%).
guide.pingLock: Pinging only accrues rewards ‚Äî OCTAA remains locked inside the NFT until it is burned.
guide.bridgeNote: To revive an NFT from the graveyard, use the BREED section. The graveyard has a 48-hour stabilization period before an NFT is ready to be revived.
guide.fees: üîò OCTAA token fees: 0% buy ‚Ä¢ 4% transfer ‚Ä¢ 10% DEX sell. These fees sustain the game economy and reward pools.

guide.title: ü™Ñ Breeding Guide
guide.intro:
This game is fully on Monad Chain. Website is just a display.
Cost: 45% of Floor Price. Breakdown: 5% CRAA burn + 15% OCTAA (to LP) + 25% OCTAA (to rewards pool). Parents lose 1 ‚≠ê and enter 48-hour cooldown.
guide.fee: Fee is 45% of floor: 5% CRAA burned | 15% OCTAA to LP | 25% OCTAA to Rewards Pool.
guide.requirement: Select 1 Male and 1 Female active NFT with at least 1 ‚≠ê.
guide.rarity: Stars: 1‚≠ê Common | 2‚≠ê Uncommon | 3‚≠ê Rare | 4‚≠ê Epic | 5‚≠ê Legendary | 6‚≠ê Mythic.
guide.penalty: Each parent loses 1 DNA star and enters 48h recovery.
guide.step1: 1. Approve OCTAA and CRAA for synthesis fees.
guide.step2: 2. Confirm Breed ‚Äî parents spend stars, new mutant joins from graveyard.
guide.note: Supply capped at ~9,700. Breed grants chance for higher rarity (+1 to +5 bonus stars).
guide.mutation: üé≤ DNA Mutation: Newborn may gain +1 to +5 bonus stars.
guide.safety: ‚ö†Ô∏è Safety: Only NFTs with DNA stars can participate.

wallet.gameGuideContent:
üéÆ CrazyOctagon Game Guide

üîπ Getting Started
‚Ä¢ Get OCTAA tokens ‚Äî for gas fees and game actions
‚Ä¢ Buy CrazyOctagon NFTs on the marketplace (coming soon)
‚Ä¢ Check NFT stats in the "NFT Inspector" section ‚Äî view locked coins, stars, and cooldowns

üîπ How to Play (PING)
‚Ä¢ Go to PING tab ‚Äî activate new octagons (starts timer)
‚Ä¢ Click PING every 24 hours to earn OCTAA
‚Ä¢ Each PING grants +2.7% bonus growth
‚Ä¢ Bonus doesn't grow if you don't ping, but it NEVER resets
‚Ä¢ You can skip pings for up to 7 days (accumulation limit)
‚Ä¢ Rewards stop growing after 7 days until you ping again

üîπ Experience Bonus
‚Ä¢ Starts at -50% penalty
‚Ä¢ Grows by +2.7% for EVERY successful ping
‚Ä¢ Max bonus: +97.2% (+ rarity multipliers)
‚Ä¢ Skipping pings within 7 days is safe ‚Äî accumulation stays automatic

üîπ Collecting Rewards (BURN)
‚Ä¢ OCTAA stays inside the NFT until it's burned
‚Ä¢ Go to BURN section, select wait time:
  - 30 minutes ‚Üí 50% to YOU
  - 120 minutes ‚Üí 70% to YOU
  - 480 minutes ‚Üí 80% to YOU
‚Ä¢ Burn fee: 10% of locked OCTAA
‚Ä¢ After timer ends, collect coins in CLAIM section

üîπ Revival (BREED)
‚Ä¢ Create new mutants from the graveyard
‚Ä¢ Need 2 active parents (1 ‚ôÇ Male, 1 ‚ôÄ Female)
‚Ä¢ Fee: 45% of Floor Price (5% CRAA burn + 15% LP + 25% rewards)
‚Ä¢ Result: Parents lose 1 star and enter 48h cooldown. One mutant is revived from graveyard with restored stars and zero coins.

üîπ OCTAA Token Fees
‚Ä¢ 0% buy fee
‚Ä¢ 4% transfer fee (to reward pool)
‚Ä¢ 10% sell fee (to reward pool)
‚Ä¢ These fees sustain the entire game economy

üîπ Strategy
‚Ä¢ Ping regularly to maximize your +2.7% daily growth
‚Ä¢ Rare octagons are more efficient for mining
‚Ä¢ Use common ones for breeding experiments
‚Ä¢ Burn only when you need liquid OCTAA

info.craLockedWarning: OCTAA locked inside an NFT are not burned and travel with the NFT when it is transferred, sold or moved in any way. They permanently belong to the NFT itself. You can obtain these tokens only by burning the NFT.

auto.title: üöÄ SYSTEM GROWTH: 10% SELL FEE
auto.desc: Where does the 10% go? 3% is automatically added to Liquidity & BURNED forever (rising price floor). 7% goes to the Reward Pool for players! This ensures game stability and long-term token value.

slippage.desc: Maximum price change you are willing to accept. In high volatility or low liquidity, the price may change between the moment the transaction is sent and its execution.

footer.secure: Trade securely at your own risk. Monad chain is at stage one.
